description: The contracting entity has a reqirement for phat us investigating and testing systems in laboratory environment.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Phase Noise Analyzer**
------------------------

**Reference:** #PW-22-01006125
**Government of Canada Buy and Sell ID:** 2022-12719

**Publication Date:** September 2, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 16, 2022 (3:00 PM)

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Selective Tendering

**Department of National Defence (DND) Requirement:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Phase Noise Analyzer for signal quality measurement in a laboratory environment. The machine must operate in the high-frequency (HF) range (1 MHz to 200 MHz) and be compatible for testing various signal sources used in HF radar systems. The proposed system must support the development and evaluation of HF radar systems.

**Key Performance Parameters:**

* Operate in the HF frequency range (1 MHz to 200 MHz)
* Compatible for testing various signal sources used in HF radar systems
* Support the development and evaluation of HF radar systems

**End-Use:**

The Phase Noise Analyzer will be used for signal quality measurement and evaluation of HF radar system components.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

Bidders will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the tender document.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Sue Hall
* Email: Susanne.Hall@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-553-2918

**Related Documents:**

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/02/b608640ae2b17f0a1c01a415ab4e2fc4/2022-12719_notice_of_proposed_procurement_npp_english.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/02/1bb8b5fcb6001391cab7ec7d702aafb4/2022-12719_avis_de_proposition_de_marche_npp_french.pdf
